title: Multimedia-Based Self-Directed Learning Design to Enhance Early Childhood TVET Reading Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic interest in TVET (Technical and Vocational Education and Training) but requires systematic reading skill development
context.additional_context: Designing reading learning activities using multimedia materials in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can read and pronounce TVET-related foundational terminology with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can focus on and comprehend TVET field texts for at least 15 minutes using multimedia content.
Learners can analyze and summarize key content from reading materials across TVET vocational fields through project-based assessment.

resources: Print Materials for Offline Group Activities
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
